projects_data.title: Flashcard Generator
projects_data.description: Flashcard Generator is a web application that allows users to create, manage, and share custom flashcards. It provides an intuitive interface and a comprehensive set of features to enhance the learning process.

projects_data.title: Resume Builder
projects_data.description: A porfessional resume builder web app where you choose from a variety of customizable templates and create a professional-looking resume that stands out to potential employers.
